welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Dakar, the vibrant capital of Senegal known for its rich culture, beautiful beaches, and lively markets. We hope you enjoy your time here and take in all the city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main international terminal serving most major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newly built terminal used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
